body: Hi Melissa,   Sorry for the unclear reply, I meant try this: If that doesn't work, I can chat with you on gchat it would be good to get this worked out. my email is ajszilasi@gmail.com [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/uY8US1k2ht789ZlGYJuqIW5keFAtjvTGReHc1BmmvXHd2K6eR4grlg5CnWS3mwyPBwWpPITCFU6qvXjdxB0atbMIGc25qxit/Capture.JPG)
